name: Pizzas are raining
description:
Pizzas are raining

This is a arcade game. This game consist of put an pizzas in the correct stack of pizzas.

How to play

The rules of this game is easy, after click to the play button start a game, you do your actions before the falling pizzas they reach the pizza below; so to move the falling pizzas you have to move them to the right or left to drop them in the right pizza at the bottom.

Language

This game there is english language.

Crediti
